dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5669 IH: Terrorist Nationality Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Yoho introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the loss of nationality by native-born or naturalized citizens due to affiliation with designated foreign terrorist organizations.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Terrorist Nationality Act of 2014
.

section.header: Loss of nationality by native-born or naturalized citizens due to affiliation with designated foreign terrorist organizations

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by inserting after political subdivision thereof the following: or a foreign terrorist organization;

subparagraph.text: by inserting before armed forces of a foreign state the following: a foreign terrorist organization or; and

by striking (A) such armed forces are engaged in hostilities against the United States and inserting the following: (A) such armed forces or foreign terrorist organizations are engaged in hostilities or acts of terror against the United States or nationals of the United States;

paragraph.text: in paragraph (7), by striking the period at the end and inserting the following: ; or; and
by inserting after paragraph (7) the following:
becoming a member of, or providing training or material assistance to, any foreign terrorist organization that such person knows, or has reason to know—

subparagraph.text: will engage in hostilities against the United States; or
will commit acts of terror against the United States or nationals of the United States.
